body.name: JOZZBY 6 Drawer Dresser, Modern Wood Dresser for Bedroom with Wide Drawers and Metal Handles, Storage Chest of Drawers for Living Room Hallway Entryway
features: Deep & Wide Drawers: The black dresser could provide larger storage space and meet your daily use. They can all be neatly placed inside,help you sort items by type,keeping all of your items and accessories organized.

Modern Design: Chest of drawers with modern design, adding bump lines to a simple monochrome plank adds a certain interest and premium aesthetic to the product. It is easy to adapt to any decorative style and creating a spacious look for your space.

Sturdy construction: The wood dresser made of a high-quality durable MDF wooden frame, scratch-resistant and water-resistant. The wooden frame construction and thickened panels make this white dresser more stable than others which will not deform after several years.

Multipurpose usage: The 6 drawer dresser not only could be a bedroom dresser for adult, but also an accent storage cabinet for office, living room, hallway, it is perfect for small spaces like apartments, dorms and office.

Easy to assemble: Detailed assembly instructions will guide you through a hassle-free installation process. The dressers ship flat to your door and require 2 adults to assemble. Assembled dimensions: 15.75"D x 47.2"W x 30.7"H

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this dresser!
reviews.reviewText: OK...First y'all, this dresser was four days in the making. LOL There were so many parts to this dresser and when I saw I had to put together the drawers too, I about died - I gave up that day. Looked at it the next day and kept going. LOL By the third day, I started back up with putting this dresser together. Once I got into the swing of things, putting it together started to flow. By the time you've done one drawer, you won't need the directions for the rest - that's half the battle. Overall great buy, nice and sturdy too. Recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great dresser but takes forever to build
reviews.reviewText: Instructions like lkea and takes forever to build but I do love the build quality and the sturdiness of it. Great paneling and doesn’t tear easily. Love the look and screws in easy. Confusing instructions on the sliding side mounts but other than that is easy to follow. Please read the instruction or you will mess up

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 23, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful and reasonable
reviews.reviewText: Just finished building this and my cat already loves it.1) All you need is one manual, sturdy screwdriver. I use the larger one because it gives me better grip. This is nice because you may make mistakes. Manual screwdriver makes it easier to unscrew, fix, and reassemble without damaging the furniture parts.2) Great price and relatively speedy delivery. Problem is room to go couldn't deliver our dresser after 6 months wait because Covid delayed everything. I didn't want to wait another 5 months.This dresser looks great, better price, and no hassle delivery.3) 6 drawers. 3 on left, and 3 on right. Thus, it's easy for my husband and I to divide the drawers. His on the left; mine on the right. No arguments.4) Be prepared to spend a few hours assembling this. Take your time reading the instructions. Read it several times if needed.I have a tendency to forget the pegs, so I spent additional time disassembling and reassembling the drawers.But the instructions are clear.I did assembled one drawer to make sure that I did put the sliding things correctly. (I didn't completely trust the manual, but most of the directions are correct. (Note, step 7 is board 16 not 15.All in all, we love it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Nothing fits right, looks nice from a distance
reviews.reviewText: This thing sucks. The build process is long and tedious; at the end of it, all the materials don't even fit together properly. The picture I have included shows how the drawers look. I am not the handiest person, but for building this with the effort I put in, I would advise people to stay away from it. It's not worth the hours spent building this piece of crap that doesn't work. It's not even worth disassembling to get your money back; that's how bad it is lol.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars The drawers are not deep as advertised
reviews.reviewText: I like the dresser, it’s a beautiful addition to my bedroom. It was easy to assemble, it took me about two hours. The size, however, is not what I expected. I originally purchased this dresser because it advertised deep drawers, and that’s not the case. The drawers are small and barely fit anything. I was a bit disappointed by this. I am now considering returning it to get a larger option since my husband and I will be sharing the dresser. OR I might have to purchase another one for him to use… tough decision for sure. Hope this helps!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for my daughter’s room. I was able to put it together by myself in a little under an hour. The pads for the legs didn’t stick very well but it’s on carpet so I didn’t really need them. Overall, it’s great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really nice dresser!!
reviews.reviewText: I was worried that for such a low price, I would receive a low quality item. I am pleased to say that is not the case! Everything was packaged securely, so no damaged pieces. Instructions were easy to follow and all the parts and hardware were clearly labeled. It did take me a couple of hours to do, but would probably take less if 2 people worked on it. I really love that the drawers have a support beam in the middle! A lot of dressers tend to sag in the middle so I'm glad not to have to worry!! Will definitely be buying additional items!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This dresser is ridiculous. It took me hours to put together, and the instructions are not the best. They’re bare minimum visuals with very few directions. The pieces do not fit together how they should. I believe it’s piece #14 (the bottom to the drawers) that’s not cut to the right length. I had to trim them in order for the front of the drawers to lay flat. The material is cheap wood, which I expected, but it scratches, chips, dents, and shows hand/finger prints. Plus the stickers to label the pieces are visible when the dresser is put together, and when I tried to take them off, I scratched the wood.
